text:
If I use java.util.Properties class to parse the properties output format in the page http://myweb/jkmanager?mime=prop, when I get the worker.wlb.balance_workers prop I obtain only the last lb member.

That because instead of
 worker.wlb.balance_workers = jvm_1, jvm2 t

he status page report two lines
 worker.wlb.balance_workers = jvm_1
 worker.wlb.balance_workers = jvm_2

Java Properties suppose the format like

key = value

and key must be unique.

Matteo.
creator: m.turra@kion.it

text: mod_jk properties are not java properties neither they pretend to be.
creator: mturk@apache.org
